column1: Wheelchair Accessibility: Indicate whether the clinics are wheelchair accessible and provide details about ramps, elevators, and wider entryways.
Sign Language Interpreters: Identify clinics that offer sign language interpreters for Deaf and hard-of-hearing patients.
Braille and Large Print Materials: Specify if clinics provide information in Braille or large print for visually impaired individuals.
Accessible Parking: Mention if there is accessible parking close to the clinic entrance for individuals with mobility challenges.
Communication Assistance: Note if clinics have communication devices or services for individuals with speech or communication difficulties.
Sensory-Friendly Environments: Highlight clinics with sensory-friendly waiting areas and examination rooms for individuals with sensory sensitivities.
Service Animal Accommodations: Indicate whether clinics welcome service animals and provide appropriate accommodations.
Home Health Services: Include information on clinics that offer home healthcare services for individuals who cannot easily access clinic facilities.
